title: Pyke: The Bloodharbor Ripper | New Champion Teaser - League of Legends

embed.description: Pyke's shipmates watched him drown. In his eyes, all of Bilgewater is guilty. Pyke's shipmates watched him drown. In his eyes, all of Bilgewater is guilty. Download the art here: https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/league-displays

body:
Finally, a teaser for our newest champion!

Edit: [Link to a hig res version for the picture. ](https://imgur.com/YBDOrai)
Edit 2: [The last Champion Roadmap comfirmed that Pyke will be a support!](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-gb/2018/04/champion-roadmap-april-2018/)

replies.body: Uhh... its just me or his lore sound a litte bit similar to the lore of Nautilus? -But with extra revenge-

My thoughts exactly.
He's stepping on naut's big daddy toes in terms of wanting to "Find the guilty..."
All of a sudden the big post about what we want out of Nautilus makes a hella lot more sense.

They are probably going to change nautilus's story to relate him to Nagakabouros, giving his old story to Pike, similar to what happened with Varus and Kassadin

They might dare to confirm that Nautilus is actualy 73 midgets inside a diver suit along with a darkin

> [{quoted}](name=Sancre,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=0002000000000001,timestamp=2018-05-10T17:51:31.096+0000)
>
> They are probably going to change nautilus's story to relate him to Nagakabouros, giving his old story to Pike, similar to what happened with Varus and Kassadin
> 
> They might dare to confirm that Nautilus is actualy 73 midgets inside a diver suit along with a darkin

I really hope they at least keep the "dude fused inside a diving suit" part because that's got some SPECTACULAR Metroid Fusion vibes to it.

Yeah, thats the 73 midgets part, they are all fused inside the suit

Jokes aside, I too would like that they keep that, but they might just rewrite him as a spirit spawned from Nagakabouros that took inspiration from the divers in bilgewaters or something like that

> [{quoted}](name=Sancre,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=000200000000000100000000,timestamp=2018-05-10T18:20:48.229+0000)
>
> Yeah, thats the 73 midgets part, they are all fused inside the suit
> 
> Jokes aside, I too would like that they keep that, but they might just rewrite him as a spirit spawned from Nagakabouros that took inspiration from the divers in bilgewaters or something like that

Dang, that means the only remaining Metroid Fusiony champ would be Kai'Sa, and she's not nearly horrifying enough.

Nah the REAL Metroid-Fusion aspect would be with Nautilus actually beign dead, and whatever inhabits the suit now just thinks it is him, based on only fragments of memories and the faint echo of an identity.

Kinda like the Sa-X in Fusion. Darn I found that fucker scary when I was a kid...

> [{quoted}](name=Ebonmaw Dragon,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-05-10T17:07:22.183+0000)
>
> Uhh... its just me or his lore sound a litte bit similar to the lore of Nautilus? -But with extra revenge-

What you want to do is start with a nice base layer of Gangplank, and then mix in the Urgot. Once you've browned the top a little, lightly dust with Nautilus and then add a garnish of Fizz to really give the flavor some pop.

{{sticker:sg-poppy}} 

Mmmm, nice & salty.
Actually, it made me think of {{champion:429}} first, with all the ghostly entity murdering those who betrayed him.
ship Pike and {{champion:429}}  next San Valentine xD

"You... you look familiar."

I don't know what you are talking about, sir. Now if you excuse me, I'm busy moving to another country.
...
No. Better to another planet.
Calm down. Random downvotes come all the time. And votes really worth jackshit, so you shouldn't worry about it too much.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=00050003,timestamp=2018-05-10T17:21:46.208+0000)
>
> Calm down. Random downvotes come all the time. And votes really worth jackshit, so you shouldn't worry about it too much.

I know, I know. I just have a lot of confidence problems, so I care disproportionately about how other people view me.

> [{quoted}](name=Micronova,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=000500030000,timestamp=2018-05-10T17:23:08.285+0000)
>
> I know, I know. I just have a lot of confidence problems, so I care disproportionately about how other people view me.

I remember my mum trying to convince me that if people _stopped_ talking about me, then I should be worried.
Yeah that didn't work at all for me - I felt like they were all mocking and hating on me and they were making my life hell.

So while I know that when you're low on confidence, what old people say doesn't help much, I will say that what helped me what just pretending I wasn't a crippling bag of insecurities, and then people started to believe it.  Then I started to believe it (a little bit - impostor syndrome will haunt me till I die).

(Please note this is not medical or therapeutic advice.  I'm just saying what worked for me.)

In other news - holy crap that Pyke image is sweet!  I hadn't seen that before!
What a hero \(*O*)/{{sticker:sg-lux}}

> [{quoted}](name=Become a Vessel,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=0005000300000004,timestamp=2018-05-10T19:16:36.162+0000)

And that's toxic masculinity at its finest right there. He can be unnecessarily worried about others' opinions of him, it's not exactly healthy, but it's something that he can learn to stop being worried over. Telling him to grow some balls is legit just being part of the problem and making it harder for him instead of being helpful. It may be the internet and you may be anonymous, but if you're anything like that in real life I really hope someone gives you an awakening to your own crap behavior.

Just take a step back and breathe in buddy.
From our perspective, we mostly just didn't have an idea what you were going on about.

And even if anyone here did see ya as a failure, what would we have to base that conclusion off?

Got any close friends or family that would be willing to listen? Sometimes it's nice to just vent to someone, even if they can't offer you a solution to your problems.

Don't concern yourself with downvotes, people misuse them often enough that they don't hold any real meaning. They certainly don't mean you're some sort of failure.

Breathe. You're okay, and you're going to be okay.

Maybe not be so immediately "this is retarded" when all we have concerning the new champion is a teaser? We'll be getting more information about him at some point, just hang out and don't jump to "this champion is retarded and I hate him".

> [{quoted}](name=Alderscroft,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=00050001,timestamp=2018-05-10T17:16:42.248+0000)
>
> Maybe not be so immediately "this is retarded" when all we have concerning the new champion is a teaser? We'll be getting more information about him at some point, just hang out and don't jump to "this champion is retarded and I hate him".

I didn't even say I hated him.

All I said was that the image that the YT link preview sits on looks a bit like Urgot, and got downvoted for it just like everything I say anywhere.

I can't even make a small opinionated observation without being wrong, because apparently I'm THAT much of a fucking failure.
Chillax, getting downvoted doesn't mean you're a failure.

Dis ^. Literally every post with very few exceptions have downvotes. People downvote to move their post closer to the top I've noticed. If you downvote everybody except for you, it's like you just got an upvote. 

There's likely other (equally stupid) reasons but this is just what I've confirmed
Yup, it's dumb that people do that, but yeah. I wish Riot would do something to limit the number of downvotes any single user could place in a particular thread. It seems like it would be beneficial.
It's the new Ryze rework. Pirate Ryze is now the Classic skin.
"You…you look familiar!"

This seems like a really cool design
My only gripe is that it seems like they recycled Nautilus's lore onto him.
At the same time however, Nautilus IS due for a lore update

Interesting to see how this guy works.

He looks soo badass. Shame such a cool looking character has to be a support. He would make such a good Assassin. 

Edit: Apparently it was leaked that he's going to be hybrid Assassin who shares gold with ADCs for kills and builds lethality.

Oh, he supports his team...
By murdering all that intend them bad will.

Inb4 he's an Assassin that gives his ADC a shield when he kills the target... 

Wait... Riot?... Please don't...
Remember kids, death is technically hard CC.

> [{quoted}](name=CelestinePrime,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=000a00000001,timestamp=2018-05-10T17:56:28.992+0000)
>
> Remember kids, death is technically hard CC.

Let kills proc Aftershock
http://img-9gag-fun.9cache.com/photo/aX9obwg_460s_v2.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=Doozku,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2018-05-10T17:14:51.796+0000)
>
> He looks soo badass. Shame such a cool looking character has to be a support. He would make such a good Assassin.

How do you know it's a support it looks like an assassin

The last champion roadmap mentions that the next champion which will get released is a support with a dark thematic.

[Source](https://nexus.leagueoflegends.com/en-gb/2018/04/champion-roadmap-april-2018/)

I don't think commenters are understanding the intention behind making a dark themed support champion... As a support for the past 5 years I am thrilled beyond belief for Pyke, my excitement is incomprehensible. This will be mold-breaking for the support role, support players now have a medium outside the realm of bubbly cuteness, shields and mage crossovers. Perhaps this will change the "carried to diamond" image current supports maintain. 

The trailer for Pyke gave me goosebumps, as I hope it will for everyone against me in the loading screen. Great work, can't wait to see the abilities! 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

edit: P.S. Nice Jack Sparrow v. Kraken touch

We have Thresh, though.

Given that I love supports, but have a hard time playing most, I'm looking forward to Pike's kit. Darker champions always appeal to me (by which I mean Thresh and Urgot dark, not Kayn dark. I do love Kayn). The teaser looked awesome and I love the idea of old port towns. Pyke looks like a win so far.

The whole "shipmates betrayed me so it's revenge time" DOES remind me of Nautilus, but since Naut's old lore of being ditched by his shipmates has been replaced by a vague paragraph that only really deals with Nagakabouros, it's possible the betrayal thing doesn't apply to him anymore.

Not interested in him based on the trailer.

1.  Bilgewater isn't an area I care that much about despite liking MF because of epic "reasons" of course.
2.  Another water themed undead?  Boring.
3.  Back from the grave and wanting revenge?  That is an aspect of Kalista's theme.  
4.  I don't find him scary or menacing in the least.  
5.  I guess my first impression of him is cliche and recycled.

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2018-05-10T17:33:23.392+0000)
>
> Not interested in him based on the trailer.
> 
> 1.  Bilgewater isn't an area I care that much about despite liking MF because of epic "reasons" of course.
> 2.  Another water themed undead?  Boring.
> 3.  Back from the grave and wanting revenge?  That is an aspect of Kalista's theme.  
> 4.  I don't find him scary or menacing in the least.  
> 5.  I guess my first impression of him is cliche and recycled.

Its not an aspect of Kalista's lore, its literally Nautilus's lore.

> [{quoted}](name=OverpoweredSoap,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=00160001,timestamp=2018-05-10T18:20:47.155+0000)
>
> Its not Kalista's lore, its literally Nautilus's lore.

I feel like they did that because they had an idea for Nautilus, and the lore and theme that was originally there had poor execution on the grounds of..."how does i get expressed through his visuals."  Pretty much to the point where if he was reworked with a "similar" bg, he'll be seen as "different character with the same name"

Now they have the same character with a different name.  It's weird, but they legit said "Nautilus didn't hit the thematic that we were going for, but this guy is. Let's talk to the boards and see what they think Naut's theme is." *looks and sees that revenge isn't fully all that necessary for thematic as his mysterious endless trudge to discover his reason for being*  "Oh, okay. We got the greenlight! There's a new slasher in town, boys!"

> [{quoted}](name=Linna Excel,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=0016,timestamp=2018-05-10T17:33:23.392+0000)
>
> 4.  I don't find him scary or menacing in the least.  

but he forces you to kill urself 0;

"We also wanted to create an aggressive playmaker, someone who doesn’t just save a drowning ally, but who forces their enemies to drown themselves… by their own hands."

> [{quoted}](name=Kervvy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=00160002,timestamp=2018-05-10T20:48:46.310+0000)
>
> but he forces you to kill urself 0;
> 
> "We also wanted to create an aggressive playmaker, someone who doesn’t just save a drowning ally, but who forces their enemies to drown themselves… by their own hands."

bit of a mistake there my man "by their own hands" is supposed to mean pyke's hands they used their as a way to hide his gender till the teaser dropped.

easy mistake to make.
WDYM {{sticker:sg-janna}}

Umm, "Pyke will drown you with HIS own hands", not "he will drown you with YOUR own hands."
or am i missing something?{{sticker:sg-soraka}}

> [{quoted}](name=Zerashy,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=RFIM2pE5,comment-id=001600020000000000000001,timestamp=2018-05-11T10:36:07.597+0000)
>
> I think the point is that they're implying he can make people kill themselves, as a way to get more enjoyment out of his acts of revenge.

i'm pretty sure it was said that the road-map used their to hide Pyke's gender until now. he seems like the sort who'd rather have his vengeance to have happened over waiting for it to be karmically appropriate.
